sourcesContent:
import { memo } from 'react' import './Footer.css' import Facebook from '../../images/facebook.png' import Gmail from '../../images/gmail.png' import { vietnamese, english } from '../../Languages/Footer' function Footer({ languageSelected }) { let languageList = (languageSelected === 'EN' ? english : vietnamese) return (

WeTravel

{languageList.txtAboutWeTravel}

{languageList.txtAboutUs}

{languageList.txtFollowAt}

Facebook
Gmail

{languageList.txtPartner}

{languageList.txtTermsOfUse}

{languageList.txtCopyRight}
) } export default memo(Footer)
